name: Altar of Death
description: When you play a card here, destroy it to get +2 Energy next turn.

name: Asgard
description: At the end of turn 4, whoever is winning here draws 2 cards.

name: Atlantis
description: If you only have one card here, it has +5 Power.

name: Avengers Compound
description: On turn 5, all cards must be played here.

name: Baxter Building
description: Whoever is winning this location gets +3 Power at the others.

name: Bifrost
description: After turn 4, move all cards one location to the right.

name: Central Park
description: Add a Squirrel to each location.

name: Cloning Vats
description: When you play a card here, add a copy to your hand.

name: Collapsed Mine
description: Fill this Location with Rocks. Skip a turn to destroy your Rocks.

name: Crimson Cosmos
description: 1, 2, and 3-Cost cards can’t be played here.

name: Daily Bugle
description: Get a copy of a card in your opponent’s hand.

name: Danger Room
description: Cards played here have a 25% chance to be destroyed.

name: Dark Dimension
description: Cards played here are not revealed until the game ends.

name: Death’s Domain
description: When you play a card here, destroy it. (Previously this effect was seen on Knowhere)

name: District X
description: Replace both decks with 10 random cards.

name: Dream Dimension
description: On turn 5, cards cost 1 more.

name: Elysium
description: Cards cost 1 less.

name: Eternity Range
description: After turn 3, add a Rock to the losing player’s side.

name: Fisk Tower
description: When a card moves here, destroy it.

name: Gamma Lab
description: After turn 3, transform all cards here into the Hulk.

name: Grand Central
description: At the end of turn 5, put a card from each player’s hand here.

name: Hala
description: At the end of turn 4, destroy all cards controlled by the player losing here.

name: Hellfire Club
description: 1-Cost cards can’t be played here.

name: Hell’s Kitchen
description: Draw a 1-Cost card from your deck.

name: Isle of Silence
description: Ongoing effects are disabled here.

name: Jotunheim
description: After each turn, cards here lose 1 Power.

name: Klyntar
description: After turn 4, merge your cards here into a Symbiote.

name: K’un-Lun
description: When a card moves here, give it +2 Power.

name: Kamar-Taj
description: On Reveal effects happen twice at this location.

name: Klyntar
description: Cards here have -2 Power.

name: Knowhere
description: On Reveal effects do not happen at this location.

name: Kyln
description: You can’t play cards here after turn 4.

name: Lamentis-1
description: Draw 3 cards. Destroy both decks.

name: Lechuguilla
description: When you play a card here shuffle 3 rocks into your deck.

name: Lemuria
description: No cards are revealed this turn.

name: Limbo
description: There is a turn 7 this game.

name: Los Diablos Base
description: At the end of turn 3, ruin a random location.

name: Mindscape
description: At the start of turn 6, swap hands.

name: Miniaturized Lab
description: On turn 3, 4, and 5, no cards can be added here.

name: Mirror Dimension
description: On turn 4, transform into one of the other locations.

name: Mojoworld
description: Whoever has more cards here gets +100 Power.

name: Monster Island
description: Add a 9-Power Monster here for each player.

name: Monster Metropolis
description: The cards with the highest Power here get +3 Power.

name: Morag
description: You can’t play your first card here each turn.

name: Muir Island
description: After each turn, give cards here +1 Power.

name: Murderworld
description: At the end of turn 3, destroy all cards here.

name: Negative Zone
description: Cards here have -3 Power.

name: New York
description: On turn 6, you can move cards to this location.

name: Nidavellir
description: Cards here have +5 Power

name: Nova Roma
description: Draw a card.

name: Olympia
description: Draw 2 cards

name: Onslaught’s Citadel
description: Ongoing effects here are doubled.

name: Oscorp Tower
description: After turn 3, all cards here swap sides.

name: Plunder Castle
description: Only Cards that cost 6 can be played here.

name: Project Pegasus
description: #ERROR!

name: Rickety Bridge
description: After each turn, if there is more than one card here, destroy them.

name: Ruins
description: [no effect]

name: Sakaar
description: Put a card from each player’s hand here.

name: Sanctum Sanctorum
description: Cards can’t be played here.

name: Savage Land
description: Add two Raptors on each side of this location.

name: Shadowland
description: Add a Ninja to each side with -2 Power.

name: Sinister London
description: When you play a card here, add a copy to another location.

name: Sokovia
description: Discard a card from each player’s hand.

name: Stark Tower
description: At the end of turn 5, give all cards here +2 Power.

name: Starlight Citadel
description: After turn 4, swap the position of each location.

name: Strange Academy
description: At the end of turn 5 move all cards here to other random locations.

name: Subterranea
description: Shuffle 5 rocks into each deck.

name: The Bar With No Name
description: Whoever has the least Power here wins.

name: The Big House
description: 4, 5, and 6-Cost cards can’t be played here.

name: The Hub
description: Add a random card to each player’s hand.

name: The Ice Box
description: Give a card in each player’s hand +1 Cost.

name: The Nexus
description: Your Power here is granted to other Locations as well.

name: The Space Throne
description: Only one card can be here for each player.

name: The Superflow
description: If you have no cards here, +1 energy each turn.

name: The Triskelion
description: Fill each player’s hand with random cards.

name: The Vault
description: On turn 6, cards can’t be played here.

name: Tinkerer’s Workshop
description: #ERROR!

name: Titan
description: 6-Cost cards cost 1 less.

name: Transia
description: Shuffle the locations.

name: Vormir
description: The first card you play here is destroyed.

name: Wakanda
description: Cards here can’t be destroyed.

name: Wakandan Embassy
description: Give +2 Power to cards in players’ hands.

name: Washington D.C.
description: Cards here with no abilities have +3 Power.

name: Weirdworld
description: Both players draw from their opponent’s decks.

name: Westview
description: Turns into a new location on turn 4.

name: Worldship
description: Destroy the other locations.

name: X-Mansion
description: At the end of turn 3, add a random card here for each player.

name: Xandar
description: Cards here have +1 Power.
